# GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/appClips | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ App Store Connect API ](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi)

- [ GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/appClips ](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-appClips)

-  GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/appClips 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/apps/{id}/relationships/appClips

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-appClips#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/apps/{id}/relationships/appClips
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-appClips#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-appClips#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/AppStoreConnectAPI/GET-v1-apps-_id_-relationships-appClips#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppAppClipsLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appappclipslinkagesresponse)`OK`
